reviewText: Great movie and performances. Daniel de Oliveira has definitely filled Cazuza's shoes the best possible way. Another great Brazilian movie.
The film is very impressive. It shows typical situations by Cazuza's real life. For me, personally, it's a pitty, that there are not much pieces of his live concerts.

It is a beautiful entertaining movie of a not-so-known outside Latin America not-English-speaking singer, his life and tragic end at the dawn of AIDS epidemic.

This work broadens mind and knowledge of a region.
